0101000110000010 0010001010110010 0 -> sum: 0111010000110100, cout: 0
0000111110011011 1001110011001100 0 -> sum: 1010110001100111, cout: 0
1101011011111110 1010110111010010 0 -> sum: 1000010011010000, cout: 1

1001010011111000 1110110011100100 1 -> sum: 1000000111011101, cout: 1
0101001000001010 0010110000100010 1 -> sum: 0111111000101101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
